\Genetsis

\GenetsisUserApi

This class allow you to use the User Api

UserApi makes calls internally to the API to request user Data.

Methods

getUserLogged()

getUserLogged() : \Genetsis\core\User

Returns the personal data of the user logged.

To check if user is logged, is not necessary call to this method, you must use Identity::isConnected(). If you only need the User ID, you must use \Genetsis\getUserLoggedCkusid

Warning: count(): Parameter must be an array or an object that implements Countable in /opt/phpdoc/vendor/twig/twig/lib/Twig/Extension/Core.php on line 1275 Warning: count(): Parameter must be an array or an object that implements Countable in /opt/phpdoc/vendor/twig/twig/lib/Twig/Extension/Core.php on line 1275

Returns

\Genetsis\core\User —

An object with the user logged personal data or null if is not logged

static
Inherited from
\Genetsis\UserApi

getUserLoggedCkusid()

getUserLoggedCkusid() : integer

Returns User ID of user Logged, stored in Things {@link Things} You must use this method to get the ckusid of user logged

getUserLoggedAvatarUrl()

getUserLoggedAvatarUrl(integer  $width = 150, integer  $height = 150) : String

(optional) 150px by default

deleteCacheUser()

deleteCacheUser(  $ckusid = null) : void

Delete cache data of a user, must call this method in a post-edit or a post-complete actions

Parameters

$ckusid

integer Identifier of user to delete cache data, if is not passed, the method get user logged

Throws

\Genetsis\/Exception

static
Inherited from
\Genetsis\UserApi

Tags

None found

getUsers()

getUsers(  $identifiers) : array

Returns the user data stored trough the DruID personal identifier.

The identifiers could be: id (ckusid), screenName, email, dni Sample: array('id'=>'XXXX','screenName'=>'xxxx');

Parameters

$identifiers

Throws

\Genetsis\/Exception

Returns

array —

A vector of {@link User} objects with user's personal data. The array could be empty.

static
Inherited from
\Genetsis\UserApi

Tags

None found
